channel.description: Recent content in javascript on Peter Theobald

item.title: Dave Says Thats Not Funny
item.description: Dave doesn’t think any of my jokes are funny. I keep trying but he always says the same thing, “That’s not funny”. So like all repetitive processes, I automated it. This page scrapes jokes from Reddit/r/Jokes and presents them here as texts to Dave.
